definitions.text: lacking in reality or substance or genuineness; not corresponding to acknowledged facts or criteria
not actually such; being or seeming fanciful or imaginary
examples: this conversation is getting more and more unreal
the fantastically unreal world of government bureaucracy
the unreal world of advertising art

definitions.text: contrived by art rather than nature
lacking material form or substance; unreal
examples: an insubstantial mirage on the horizon
